channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Smart Slider 3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Smart Slider 3

item.title: CVE-2022-3357|2024-08-03T01:07:06.526Z -- unknown -- smart%20slider%203
item.description: The Smart Slider 3 WordPress plugin before 3.5.1.11 unserialises the content of an imported file, which could lead to PHP object injection issues when a user import (intentionally or not) a malicious file, and a suitable gadget chain is present on the site.
